column4: is there a link to what version of nvidia binary drivers will be supported in Gusty?
Those are the latest linux drivers and I doubt they'll be upgraded even if there are new drivers released
is that also true for Fiesty?
thanks for the info - time to make a decision.
please do not use gutsy until its release in october
would you suggest performing a manual install of the binary drivers then?
that's the only way you'll get 3d accel in feisty... but its not supported by ubuntu
yes what? for the manual install?
you won't be able to get 3d acceleration on feisty without manually installing the drivers yourself
